snippet: The BBC’s former director-general has challenged testimony about how much the BBC Trust knew about payouts to departing executives.
abstract: Increasingly bitter dispute between Chris Patten, head of the BBC Trust, and Mark Thompson, former director-general of BBC, will get public airing before committee of British Parliament.
lead_paragraph: The BBC’s former director-general has challenged testimony about how much the BBC Trust knew about payouts to departing executives.

headline.main: Parliament Hearing to Focus on BBC Severance Dispute
headline.print_headline: Parliament Hearing to Focus On BBC Severance Dispute
